pullRequest.title: AF-2404 : Package dropdown button is not visible (slowly appears) when creating an asset
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixed invisible package dropdown by setting it up on PostConstruct in KieSelectElement.


Moved unnecessary multiple callbacks to one for PackageListBox.


Removed parent container of KieSelectElement to be used directly.


Resetting package list dropdown to fix dropdown with previous application package details.


Ensemble:
jbpm-wb #1409
Deployable WAR Link: https://drive.google.com/open?id=11j9krqVd5xgBhoGw_sMBxAkGICkbzYTj

commit.message:
AF-2404 : Package dropdown button is not visible (slowly appears) when creating an asset

 * Fixed invisible pacakge dropdown by setting it up on PostConstruct in KieSelectElement.

 * Moved unnecessary multiple callbacks to one for PackageListBox.

 * Removed parent container of KieSelectElement to be used directly.

AF-2404 : Package dropdown button is not visible (slowly appears) when creating an asset

nodes.bodyText: I'll be picky here... but the property name is not clear... equalsBehaviorSelect would be more appropiate than equalsBehaviorSelectContainer. The same would apply for  the @Datafield... and the html template.
